about_the_game:
Weelco is a big gallery of free high quality (4k) VR 360° videos. By using Weelco app and VR headset you can easily dive into virtual reality world - watch best 360° videos, subscribe to interesting channels and stay updated with latest VR trending videos or create your own channel and upload your VR art. Install the app and experience virtual reality emotions choosing from various categories:
- VR horror
- VR travel guide
- VR music
- VR roller coaster
- VR movie trailers
and more. New videos every day!

User-friendly interface and multi-language voice search allow you to enjoy virtual world 100% handsfree: you can navigate through the app, choose videos by categories, easily play and pause videos. Weelco VR has NO advertising/pop-up icons.

Download Weelco VR for mobile: iOS, Android, Xiaomi.

By using Weelco app and VR headset you can easily dive into virtual reality world - watch best 360° videos, subscribe to interesting channels and stay updated with latest VR trending videos or create your own channel and upload your VR art. Install the app and experience virtual reality emotions choosing from various categories:

User-friendly interface and multi-language voice search allow you to enjoy virtual world 100% handsfree: you can navigate through the app, choose videos by categories, easily play and pause videos. Weelco VR has NO advertising/pop-up icons.

name: Weelco VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Weelco VR - Watch, upload and share 360° videos on your Virtual Reality headset.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Bulgarian, Greek, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish
